attributes.action: Get our government to make Darts an Olympic Sport
attributes.background: Darts the sport of throwing a small pointy thing at a round thing. It's an easy game to play but a hard game to play well. Surely this target sport deserves Olympic Status

rejection.details:
The decision about which sports are in the Olympics is made by the International Olympic Committee (IOC). You can find out more about the IOC here:

http://www.olympic.org/ioc
